/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, buildings rise, their white facades gleaming in the sunlight. A black car can be seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The image is a beautiful representation of urban life in Beijing, with its blend of natural and man-made elements.
